Name: Max Generations
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines how many solver generations to run before stopping execution. Execution can be resumed at a later moment.

Name: Max Gradient Norm
Termination Criteria.Description: Maximum value of the norm of the gradient.

Name: Max Stall Generations
Termination Criteria.Description: Maximum times stalled with function evaluation bigger than the best one.

Name: Parameter Relative Tolerance
Termination Criteria.Description: Relative tolerance in parameter difference between generations.

Name: Initial Value
Variables Configuration.Description: Defines the initial value at which the algorithm will start looking for an optimum.

Name: Current Evaluation
Internal Settings.Description: Function evaluation in the current step.

Name: Previous Evaluation
Internal Settings.Description: Function evaluation in the previous step.

Name: Max Stall Counter
Internal Settings.Description: Counts the number the algorithm has been stalled in function evaluation bigger than the best one.
